subject: [Radiance-general] workshop 2005 presentations
body:
Hi all,

Christoph Reinhart just put together the 2005 workshop presentations,
which are now available on
http://www.radiance-online.org/radiance-workshop4/  as html/pdf, zip and
tar.bz2 file.

happy reading&rendering
-Peter

--
pab-opto, Freiburg, Germany, http://www.pab-opto.de
[see web page to check digital email signature]
